name.description: An identifier, usually a unique string or number
name.description_zh: 标识符，通常为一个唯一的字符串或数字

disabled.description: Whether to disable the check box

label-disabled.description: Whether to disable checkbox text clicking
label-disabled.description_zh: 是否禁用复选框文本点击

label-position.description_zh: 文本位置，可选值为 left

icon-size.description: Icon size, default unit is px
icon-size.description_zh: 图标大小，默认单位为 px

bind-group.description: Whether to be bound to a checkbox group

methods.name: toggle
methods.description: Toggle the selected state, pass 'true' to be selected, 'false' to uncheck, and not to pass the argument to negate
methods.description_zh: 切换选中状态，传 `true` 为选中，`false` 为取消选中，不传参为取反

events.name: change
events.description: An event that is triggered when a binding value changes
events.description_zh: 当绑定值变化时触发的事件

events.name: click
events.description: Triggered when the checkbox is clicked
